attributes.action: Ask the Queen to Disolve Parliament and call for an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The public's faith in Parliament is now at an all time low. Every day another MP is forced to come clean about their expenses - all paid for from the public purse, ie you and me. The only way to sort this sorry mess out is to allow the public to have its say! Therefore, we are calling on the Prime Minister to seek the Queen's permission to disolve Parliament and call an immediate General Election. The public who voted these people into power will then have the opportunity to vote them out.
We need MPs who are there to serve their electorate, not line their pockets at our expense. This will be the wake up call every politician of every party should take note of.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
